statements: SELECT * FROM Artifact_Provenance;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance, provenance_date FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE artifact_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE authenticity = TRUE;
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, current_location FROM Artifact_Provenance ORDER BY current_location DESC;
SELECT provenance, COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts FROM Artifact_Provenance GROUP BY provenance HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE provenance_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY provenance_date DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance, current_location FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE current_location = 'Museum' ORDER BY artifact_name ASC;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance, authenticity FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE authenticity = TRUE ORDER BY artifact_name DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance_date, current_location FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE provenance = 'Antiquity' ORDER BY provenance_date ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts, SUM(CASE WHEN authenticity = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS authentic_artifacts, SUM(CASE WHEN authenticity = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fake_artifacts FROM Artifact_Provenance;
SELECT * FROM Artifacts;
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name FROM Artifacts WHERE artifact_id = 1;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance FROM Artifacts WHERE provenance = 'Egypt';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, artifact_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE artifact_id = 3;
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, provenance FROM Artifacts WHERE artifact_name = 'Sculpture'
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, provenance FROM Artifacts WHERE provenance LIKE '%Italy%' ORDER BY artifact_name ASC
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, provenance FROM Artifacts WHERE artifact_id = 10 OR artifact_id = 20
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, provenance FROM Artifacts WHERE artifact_name LIKE '%Pottery%'
SELECT * FROM artifact_locations;
SELECT artifact_id, location_id, date_time FROM artifact_owners ORDER BY date_ownership DESC;
SELECT artifact_id, owner_id, date_ownership FROM artifact_owners WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM artifact_history WHERE event_description LIKE '%damage%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT artifact_id, event_description, event_date FROM artifact_history WHERE artifact_id = 'abcdef-12345-6789';
SELECT * FROM artifact_locations ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT artifact_id, location_id FROM artifact_locations WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT artifact_id, owner_id, date_ownership FROM artifact_owners WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM artifact_owners;
SELECT artifact_id, event_description FROM artifact_history WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM artifact
SELECT artifact_name, acquisition_date FROM artifact
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_description, provenance FROM artifact
SELECT * FROM artifact_location
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM artifact_location
SELECT * FROM artifact;
SELECT artifact_name, acquisition_date FROM artifact WHERE provenance = 'Museum';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM artifact_transaction WHERE buyer_id = 12345;

SELECT a.artifact_name, l.location_name, at.transaction_date FROM artifact a INNER JOIN artifact_transaction at ON a.artifact_id = at.artifact_id INNER JOIN artifact_location l ON a.artifact_id = l.location_id;
SELECT owner_name, contact_information FROM artifact_owner WHERE contact_information IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Artifacts;
SELECT artifact_name, value FROM Artifacts WHERE provenance = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM Artifacts ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, provenance, value FROM Artifacts WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT artifact_name, location_name FROM Artifacts JOIN ArtifactsLocation ON Artifacts.artifact_id = ArtifactsLocation.location_id;
SELECT artifact_name, value FROM Artifacts WHERE provenance='Ancient'
SELECT * FROM ArtifactsLocation ORDER BY security_level DESC

SELECT Artifacts.artifact_name, ArtifactsTransactions.transaction_date, ArtifactsOwners.owner_name FROM Artifacts JOIN ArtifactsTransactions ON Artifacts.artifact_id = ArtifactsTransactions.artifact_id JOIN ArtifactsOwners ON ArtifactsTransactions.buyer_id = ArtifactsOwners.owner_id
SELECT audit_id, action FROM ArtifactsAuditTrail WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT artifact_name, value, owner_name FROM Artifacts JOIN ArtifactsTransactions ON Artifacts.artifact_id = ArtifactsTransactions.artifact_id JOIN ArtifactsOwners ON ArtifactsTransactions.seller_id = ArtifactsOwners.owner_id
